channel.title: PerfectScape 718
channel.description:
[COLOR=#000000][CENTER][IMG]http://perfectscape.netai.net/images/banner.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=6][COLOR=#000000]Links[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/index.php - Forums [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/PerfectScape%20Launcher.jar - PerfectScape Launcher
-PerfectScape is a brand new Runescape Private Server. I made this server because i miss having a community, and i hope that one day we will have a great community. Anyways,
[CENTER][B]PerfectScape Features[/B]
- 15+ PvM bosses
- 20+ Minigames including new Minigames such as "Dark Invasion"
- All 25 skills working including Dungeoneering and Construction
- Great Combat Formula
- 10 different Slayer Masters
- The Grand Exchange player based
And much more!
[LEFT][COLOR=#000000][SIZE=6][B]Media[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][/LEFT] [SPOILER=Media]Our new home [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/home.png[/img] Grand Exchange Player based (Fixed search lag) [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/ge2.png[/img] [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/ge1.png[/img] Polypore dungeon [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/polypore%20dungeon.png[/img] PvM/Custom bosses [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/bandos.png[/img] [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/sunfreet.png[/img] [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/blink.png[/img] [img]http://www.ps718.cu.cc/images/features/wildywyrm.png[/img][/SPOILER]
PerfectScape Trailer www.youtube.com/embed/8lcVhWXBK5Q
